Package io.github.moctave.weftspace

Class DataReader

java.lang.Object
io.github.moctave.weftspace.DataReader
public class DataReader extends Object
A class which reads data from a file and stores it in a node tree.

  • Nested Class Summary

    DataReader.Option
    Special flags that can be used when parsing

  • Method Details

    • parse

      public void parse(DataReader.Option... options)
      Parses the file associated with this object, and stores all nodes in the tree.
      Parameters:
      options - Any DataReader.Options you wish to apply to the parse.

    • makeNode

      public DataNode makeNode(String line, int number, boolean checkForFlags)
      Parses a single line and converts it to a node.
      Parameters:
      line - The line to parse.
      number - The number of the line being parsed, for debugging purposes.
      checkForFlags - Whether or not node flags should be considered and applied.
      Returns:
      The node created from the line.

    • trimComments

      public static String trimComments(String line)
      Trims comments from a line of text, removing everything after the first # character.
      Parameters:
      line - The line to trim.
      Returns:
      The uncommented line.

    • countLeadingTabs

      public static int countLeadingTabs(String line)
      Counts the number of leading tabs on a line.
      Parameters:
      line - The line to count.
      Returns:
      The number of tabs that come before the first non-tab character on the line.

    • containsOnlyWhitespace

      public static boolean containsOnlyWhitespace(String line)
      Checks if a line contains only whitespace, as defined by Character.isWhitespace(char).
      Parameters:
      line - The line to check.
      Returns:
      true if the line is empty or contains only whitespace, or false if it contains other characters as well.
